short_summary: Purchase of a Chromatographic Measuring Instrument Accessory, High Purity Nitrogen Gas Generator
description: Health Canada has a requirement for the acquisition of a Chromatographic Measuring Instrument Accessory, High Purity Nitrogen Gas Generator. The Nutrition Research Division of Health Canada is required to replace an aging Nitroflow 60DNA chromatographic measuring instrument accessory which supports 3 different High Pressure liquid chromatograph-mass spectrometer/mass spectrometer (LC-MS/MS) chromatographic chromatography systems by supplying a high purity (99.9%) source of nitrogen gas.
full_summary:
================
**Title (English)**
----------------
Purchase of Chromatographic Measuring Instrument Accessory: High Purity Nitrogen Gas Generator

**Title (French)**
----------------
Achat d'un accessoire d'instrument de mesure chromatographique : générateur d'azote gazeux à haute pureté

**Reference Number**
----------------
PW-22-01004892

**Publication Date**
----------------
August 19, 2022

**Tender Closing Date and Time**
---------------------------------
September 28, 2022, 2:00 pm (Eastern Time)

**Procurement Entity**
------------------
Health Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------
Shallee A. Doll  
Email: [shallee.doll@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:shallee.doll@hc-sc.gc.ca)  
Phone: (613) 297-4875  
Address: 200 Eglantine Drive, Tunney's Pasture, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9, Canada

**Procurement Description**
-------------------------

Health Canada seeks to acquire a Chromatographic Measuring Instrument Accessory, High Purity Nitrogen Gas Generator, to replace an aging Nitroflow 60DNA chromatographic measuring instrument accessory. This accessory supports three different High Pressure Liquid Chromatograph-Mass Spectrometer/Mass Spectrometer (LC-MS/MS) systems. The acquired instrument must be capable of supplying laboratory-grade high-purity (99.9%) nitrogen gas to these systems.

**Bidder Eligibility**
-------------------
Bid Competition is open to all qualified bidders.

**Notice URL**
-------------
A comprehensive notice package is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/19/b2cba63ea21f986fbaffc9aa77725a75/bilingual\_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/19/b2cba63ea21f986fbaffc9aa77725a75/bilingual_npp.pdf)

**Delivery Location**
-----------------
The goods are to be delivered to: Health Canada, Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

**Classifications**
-----------------
Gaining Scheduled National Interest Boundary (GSIN) Code: N6640  
Laboratory Equipment and Supplies. STD-Massage159
Note that some information is missing and is marked with `None`. Out of good practice, we removed
